text: We have attained complete control of this [[url:script_link_campaign_provinces]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_provinces}}]]province[[/tooltip]][[/url]].

The more warbands you field, the harder it becomes to maintain them all. As supply lines become more complex, gold and supplies will ‘go missing’ – the chieftains having little idea where they may have gone...

WHAT AND WHERE DIS. The men and monsters of the north have long sought to overthrow the civilisations of the south, but have always been thrown back to their frozen wastelands. But no more! Now, under your control, the Norscan hordes have been unleashed upon the Old World. The Chaos Gods gaze admiringly falls upon the leader of this cataclysmic event: you!
YOUR CHAMP UI TEXT REP
[[col:red]]The settlement chain in this region cannot be built to a high enough tier to construct this building.[[/col]]
In order to research this technology, this settlement must be captured and held for a turn.

It is no easy task to secure the cooperation of such a large, hairy, foul smelling beast; the same can be said of the mammoths this man tames.
If you can tame a mammoth, a bog beast is childs play, at least that's what the last tamer said before he was eaten.
